review: Didn't expect such a horrible and unfinished product from Amazon.Youtube : Youtube casting does not work. Youtube rental videos get stuck forever. Not sure if Amazon issue or Youtube.But after using the product for a week I am very certain it is Amazons mistake.Sling TV : Main reason for me to get fire tv stick.What a disaster. Every five minutes video stops and goes back to home page or just gets stuck. Insane.... it happens every five minutes.Yupptv : Dont want to talk about it.It just makes me very angry and frustrating. Just like sling TV, channels get stuck , nav goes back to home page, automatically channel changes ..all making your watching experience horrible.So if you are a person who wants to just WATCH and relax a tv channel or youtube video rental or videos this is NOT the product for you.What a shame...Amazon...  free or not this product is NOT worth.
author: JSK
